title.value: Exploring the roles of artificial intelligence in surgical education: A scoping review
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned at the start of the document.
title.quote: Exploring the roles of artificial intelligence in surgical education: A scoping review

extractions.description: This paper is a review article that explores the current and future roles of artificial intelligence in surgical education. It highlights how AI is evolving in the context of surgical training and education, identifies the focus areas of existing studies, and provides insights into future directions for integrating AI.

type.justification: The paper is a scoping review and therefore primarily theoretical, as it collects and analyzes existing studies rather than conducting new experiments or empirical research.
type.quote: Hence, the purpose of this scoping review is to explore the current and future roles of AI in surgical education.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on the application of AI in the context of surgical education, as indicated by the title and content of the paper.
name.quote: Artificial Intelligence (AI) applications, has started to evolve in surgical education.

name.justification: The paper focuses on how AI is integrated and used in medical education, specifically surgical training and education.
name.quote: AI can help optimize the education of trainees and our results can help educators and researchers identify areas that need further investigation.

name.justification: The paper discusses the use of AI in simulation settings for surgical training, highlighting its importance.
name.quote: Out of 93, 84 were conducted in the simulation setting, and 89 targeted technical skills.
